achievements: Made significant contributions to number theory and elasticity theory
Worked under the pseudonym Monsieur LeBlanc due to gender discrimination in academia
Co-founded the White Rose resistance group in Nazi Germany
Distributed anti-war leaflets and advocated for peace
Executed by the Nazis for treason
Known for her role as Sansa Stark in the HBO series Game of Thrones
Starred in films such as X-Men: Apocalypse and Dark Phoenix
